LanguageData.DropThingLodger: Temporary faction members will not drop their items.
LanguageData.DropThingLocked: This person refuses to drop this.
LanguageData.SetPodLauncherTargetFuelLevel: Set target fuel level to {0}\nMax distance: {1} tiles
LanguageData.AllCaravanMembersMentalBreak: Stopped because: Everyone is in a mental break.
LanguageData.WasWornByCorpse: Tainted from being worn by a corpse.
LanguageData.ForceExitAndRemoveMapCountdownTip: Your colonists will automatically reform the caravan and leave this area in {0}.
LanguageData.RoomSurgerySuccessChanceFactor: Surgery success chance multiplier from room
LanguageData.ClickToSortByThisColumn: Click to sort by this column.
LanguageData.WorkPriorityShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Increase priority\nShift + right click: Decrease priority
LanguageData.WorkPriorityShiftClickEnableDisableTip: Shift + click: Enable all\nShift + right click: Disable all
LanguageData.AllowedAreaShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Set all to home\nShift + right click: Set all to unrestricted
LanguageData.CheckboxShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Check all\nShift + right click: Uncheck all
LanguageData.EnterCooldown: You can't re-enter for another {0} days.
LanguageData.GiveGiftViaTransportPodsTradeRequestWarn:
Warning: You cannot complete trade requests by using transport pods.
If you send the goods, the settlement will accept them as gifts but they will not reward you.

For trading, approach the settlement with a caravan!

Are you sure you want to gift the loaded goods to the faction?
LanguageData.ClickToViewInQuestsTab: Click to view this quest in quests tab
LanguageData.CannotOrderNonControlled: Cannot order characters you do not control.
LanguageData.ExtraFactionDesc: The faction {PAWN_labelShort} originally belongs to. {PAWN_pronoun} will rejoin their home faction when they depart from their current faction.
LanguageData.HostilityReponseTip: Change how this person will react to nearby enemies when not drafted.
LanguageData.ShowLearningHelperWhenEmptyToggleButton: Toggle visibility of the learning helper when it is empty.\n\nThe learning helper is always visible if there is a concept activated to be learned. This toggle makes it disappear when no concept is active.
LanguageData.ShowBeautyToggleButton: Toggle the beauty display.\n\nDisplays the beauty of the world as would be perceived by a character standing where the mouse is pointing.
LanguageData.ShowRoomStatsToggleButton: Toggle room stats display.\n\nDisplays room stats of the room where the mouse is pointing.
LanguageData.ShowColonistBarToggleButton:
Toggle colonist bar.

Displays icons and basic status for all colonists along the top of the screen.

You can reorder the colonists in the colonist bar by right-click and dragging them.
LanguageData.AutoHomeAreaToggleButton: Toggle automatically expanding the home area around new constructions.
LanguageData.AutoRebuildButton: Toggle automatic rebuild of destroyed structures in the home area.
LanguageData.CategorizedResourceReadoutToggleButton: Toggle categorized mode on the resource readout.
LanguageData.ShowAnimalNamesToggleButton: Toggle displaying animal names for tame named animals.
LanguageData.ShowFertilityOverlayToggleButton: Toggle fertility overlay.\n\nThis shows how fertile the ground is, which affects what kinds of plants can grow and how fast they grow.
LanguageData.ShowTerrainAffordanceOverlayToggleButton:
Toggle visibility of terrain affordance.

This relates to what kinds of building can be constructed at each location.

For example, some types of ground only accept light or medium buildings, but not heavy ones. Bridges can only be built on water.
LanguageData.LockNorthUpToggleButton: Lock the rotation of the camera so the north pole is always up.
LanguageData.UsePlanetDayNightSystemToggleButton: Toggle day/night lighting on the planet view.
LanguageData.ShowExpandingIconsToggleButton: Toggle displaying expanding icons instead of the regular icons for distant objects.
LanguageData.ShowWorldFeaturesToggleButton: Toggle visibility of names of landforms.
LanguageData.GameConditionsTip: Special conditions affecting the area right now.
LanguageData.NoStuffsToBuildWith: У вас немає матеріалів, з яких можна це збудувати.
LanguageData.MustPlaceHeadOnShipBeam: Must place with head attached to ship structural beam.
LanguageData.MustPlaceNextToHopperAccepter: Must be placed next to something that needs a hopper.
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnSteamGeyser: Must be placed directly on a steam geyser.
LanguageData.MustPlaceCoolerWithFreeSpaces: Both the hot and cold sides of the cooler must be exposed.
LanguageData.MustPlaceVentWithFreeSpaces: Both the sides must be exposed for air to pass through.
LanguageData.MustPlaceAdjacentStandable: Must be placed with standable space on all sides.
LanguageData.MustPlaceNearFuelingPort: Must be placed next to a pod launcher's fueling port.
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnDrillable: Must be placed on drillable resources.
LanguageData.CannotPlaceAdjacentTrap: Cannot be placed next to traps.
LanguageData.Watermill_WaterUsedTwice: Flow reduced: Turbulence from other watermill
LanguageData.CasketWarning: Warning!\n\n{PAWN_nameDef} is your last free-standing colonist! If you let {PAWN_objective} step into that casket, you may not be able to continue playing. Are you sure you want to proceed?
LanguageData.HibernateWarning:
Шарлон Вайтстоун is ready to begin the reactor's hibernation recovery sequence.

He warns you that the process will take about 15 days, and the energy signature will be detectable from a long distance away.

This sort of energy signature indicates interstellar flight capability, and will attract gangs of desperate raiders and swarms of deadly mechanoids.

You will be assaulted with an intensity you've never seen. Make sure your defenses are prepared first.
LanguageData.HibernateWarningStandalone:
The reactor is ready to power up.

The process will take about 15 days, and the energy signature will be detectable from a long distance away. This sort of energy signature indicates interstellar flight capability, and will attract gangs of desperate raiders and swarms of deadly mechanoids.

You will be assaulted with an intensity you've never seen. Make sure your defenses are prepared first.
LanguageData.HibernateWarningPacifist: Шарлон Вайтстоун is ready to begin the reactor's hibernation recovery sequence. He warns you that the process will take about 15 days.
LanguageData.HibernateWarningStandalonePacifist: The reactor is ready to power up. The process will take about 15 days.
LanguageData.SkillNeurotrainerDescription: Одноразова супер-доза механітів, що тренує конкретне вміння.\n\nДоза вводиться через очну западину. Після потрапляння у мозок, механіти швидко удосконалюють навички суб'єкта у конкретній області, перетворюючи себе в нервову тканину.
LanguageData.SkillNeurotrainerUsed: {USER_labelShort} використав нейротренер {1} щоб піднятися з рівня {2} до рівня {3}.
LanguageData.Title: Title
LanguageData.QualityDescription: An item's quality is how well-made it is.
LanguageData.GameOverEveryoneDead: Усі мертві чи пішли. Ця історія закінчена.\n\nМожливо, хтось інший знайде руїни цього місця корисними.
LanguageData.GameOverPlanetkillerImpact:
At near-lightspeed, the planetkiller weapon slammed into the ground with the force of a trillion hydrogen bombs. Like a water balloon shot with a rifle, this world liquified under the impact and sprayed its molten guts across the cosmos.

Part of {0} is now a small asteroid belt. The rest is a molten, radioactive hellscape, constantly rippling with kilometers-high planetquakes.

You did not survive.
LanguageData.GameOverShipLaunchedEnding: Тепер ваша машинна персона спробує направити корабель у безпечне місце. У цій системі вона може знайти процвітаючу планету. Чи може здійснити багатовікову подорож до іншої зірки. Може навіть вирішити сховатися під льодом астероїду на кілька тисяч років, чекаючи, коли хтось збудує тут новий утопічний світ.\n\nВи дізнаєтесь, коли прокинетесь.
LanguageData.DeterioratingDueToLackOfMaintenance: Deteriorating due to lack of maintenance.
LanguageData.DeepDrillExhausted: Deep drill resources exhausted, drill automatically forbidden. Unforbid to begin mining of {0}.
LanguageData.CompassTip: Shows the north direction. Click to rotate the camera so the north pole is up.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerButtonTip: Клікніть, щоб перейти до режиму планування, де ви зможете розпланувати подорож та підрахувати дистанцію між точками.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerUsingAverageTicksPerMoveWarn: Planning mode uses the default caravan speed. Your speed may vary.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerPressEscapeToReturnToCaravan: ESC: Return to the caravan formation dialog.
LanguageData.PawnTooltipPsychicEntropy:
Psychic entropy: {0}/{1}
Fall rate: {2}/{3}s({4}s until zero)

Psychic entropy increases after performing a psycast.
Going over the safe limit can lead to long-term health consequences.
Whenever entropy reaches zero, it leaves a psychic hangover behind.
LanguageData.PawnTooltipPsychicEntropyLimit: Toggle psychic entropy limiter.\n\nGoing over your psychic entropy limit can cause serious health consequences, including long-term psychic breakdown, and even brain damage for significant overages. The higher over-limit the entropy is, the more dangerous the effects.
LanguageData.Reward_Pawn_DropPod: a {0_age}-year-old {0_title} named {0_nameDef} will arrive in a transport pod {0_relationInfoInParentheses}
LanguageData.Reward_Pawn_WalkIn: a {0_age}-year-old {0_title} named {0_nameDef} will arrive and join you {0_relationInfoInParentheses}
LanguageData.Reward_Items: транспортні капсули прибудуть з наступними ресурсами (загальна вартість {1}): \n{0}
LanguageData.Reward_Goodwill: ваші фракційні стосунки з {0_name} покращаться на {1}
